details.msg: [LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Uses complex conditional edges and error handling nodes instead of expert's simple linear pipeline (generate_sql → execute_sql → generate_answer)", severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Uses custom dataclass AgentState instead of expert's TypedDict with message-based state management", severity='major'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Implements custom database class instead of using LangChain's SQLDatabase utility like the expert", severity='minor'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue="Uses different LLM model (gpt-4-turbo-preview) instead of expert's gpt-4o-mini", severity='minor'), LlmAsJudgeEvidence(issue='Does not return AIMessage objects as required, returns plain strings instead', severity='major')]
